plugin.name: xBroadcast_Kills
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: broadcast when a mob is killed
plugin.description:
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]
Broadcasts when a mob is killed Example function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if id == "aaa61c4570508448e19c7c14" and msg == 1 then local pvar = GetPluginVariable( "aaa61c4570508448e19c7c14", "kill_info")
-- get the mobs loadstring( pvar )() kill = kill_info end end
xBroadcast_Kills : Broadcast 1 kill_info = {} kill_info.mob = "The miller's wife" kill_info.vorpal = 0 kill_info.vorpal_weapon = "" kill_info.time = 1275867123 kill_info.gold = "2267" kill_info.bonusxp = "5" kill_info.level = "139" kill_info.xp = "5" kill_info.tp = 0
TODO: when corpse doesn't give gold, kill is not inserted into the database

trigger.match: ^(\w+) splits? (\d+) gold coins?. Your share is (\d+) gold\.$
trigger.name: splitgold

trigger.match: ^You killed a Triv bonus mob!! Triv point added\.$
trigger.name: trivmob

trigger.match: ^Deep magic stirs within your weapon. It seems to have a life of its own.$
trigger.name: vorpmob

muclient.script:
require "var" require "serialize" require "commas" require "pluginhelper" require "verify" require "ldplugin"
kill_info = {} kill_info.tp = 0 kill_info.vorpal = 0 kill_info.vorpal_weapon = ''
cur_weapon = ''
function mobxp( name, line, wildcards ) if name == 'mobxp' then kill_info.bonusxp = 0 kill_info.xp = wildcards[1] elseif name == 'bonusxp' then kill_info.bonusxp = wildcards[1] end
end
function vorpmob( name, line, wildcards) kill_info.vorpal = 1 kill_info.vorpal_weapon = cur_weapon end
function mobgold( name, line, wildcards ) if kill_info.mob == nil then kill_info = {} kill_info.tp = 0 return end if name == 'mobgold' then kill_info.gold = wildcards[1] elseif name == 'splitgold' then kill_info.gold = wildcards[2] end kill_info.gold = string.gsub(kill_info.gold, ",", "") kill_info.time = GetInfo(304) var.kill_info = serialize.save( "kill_info", kill_info ) phelper:broadcast(1, var.kill_info) kill_info = {} kill_info.tp = 0 kill_info.vorpal = 0 kill_info.vorpal_weapon = ''
end
function trivmob( name, line, wildcards ) kill_info.tp = 1 end
